description_zh: 让对象超出场景范围时可以重新出现在另一侧。
description_en: Make an object leaving the layout reappear on the other side.

conditions.description_zh: 在边界穿梭行为作用生效，对象位置发生改变时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when the object position is changed by wrapping.

properties.description_zh: 让对象在场景边界或视窗边界穿梭
properties.description_en: Whether to wrap to layout bounds or viewport bounds.
